142719969.review: I scored a 100% complete English mod that covers the game AND DLC (score!!!). So, I have begun streaming the game and I must say MY GOD IT'S AMAZING!!! As a long standing fan of Sword and Fairy (Chinese Paladin) and Xuan Yuan Sword, I had to play this. The combat is tense, the characters are amazing, and the graphics are fantastic. Literally my ONLY complaint is that the load screens are horrible and it lags ALOT at times. I'm running the game at half the graphical/performance settings and it lags less, but still happens. Now, my PC isn't by any means spectacular, but I haven't had issues running Elden Rings or any other games really on my PC so this, is troubling to me. Aside from the lags though, the game is amazing (also the lag hasn't really hindered the gameplay at all). Really hope an Eng version comes out, but until then, the Eng Mod will do.

122870615.review:
WARNING: THIS GAME HAS NO ENGLISH LANGUAGE SUPPORT!
*******************************************************

I did buy this for three bucks (90% off) in order to take a couple of screenshots. Money well spent in my opinion.

It was very easy to figure out how to win battles and walk around in this beautiful world. The actions are displayed as icons with the keys written right next to them.

There are four attacks and a parrot that heals you from time to time (press X key to call him if he is available)

Very strange: I had to hold down the right mouse button and move my mouse like this to look around.

Note: There is an English mod in the works, hope this is completed soon: https://steamcommunity.com/app/724970/discussions/0/3855581793666247699/

84851808.review: 剧情写得确实就和三流网文差不多，唯一可以表扬的地方在于其战斗、装备与技能系统做得还是有些许新意，但到快要结尾那段就开始变差了，敌人血牛化，阵容技能也就那一两套，一场差不多五分钟，大招动画还不能跳过，玩起来就像是在打工一样。可对于rpg来说剧情太重要了，剧情的质量会直接影响代入感，以及能不能让人想继续玩下去。播片做得也有点糟糕，配音应该是请专业的来了，但这台本真的是太尬了，没有动捕就少放面部特写嘛，老是让人看那些硬的像法棍一样表情变化真的很煞风景的。这款游戏只适合那些想扩大国产rpg知识面的人，不适合哪些想获得快乐的。总的来说，这款游戏应该属于比较差的一般货色吧。

70168960.review:
Game play is very awkward in all aspects. 
The plot itself is especially awkward. The side missions have very weak connections to the main plot. Then in order to make the story line less awkward, they have to include exceptionally long cut-scenes to fill in the gaps and explain to the player what is going on. Sometimes when the cut scenes are way too long, they insert a small piece of mission "find this guy in the town", which generally takes less than 5mins, then next cut-scene kicks in. Oh, and some cut-scenes have weird low quality. The towns are very large which supposedly to be very fun to navigate, in reality it is very boring. There are very little things to do in the towns, characters look identical from each other. 
In terms of control it's actually pretty smooth (hmm, aside from the weird controller key mapping), that's the sad part. I think the development team could deliver a good game, just for some reason they don't put up together very well.

Enemies hit for more than you're HP forcing you to keep resetting.

A shit ton of enemies either spawn or respawn especially making you rely on you're gods.

Boss fights are too long (some lasting more than 10 minutes).

Extra note- Last boss one KOs you no matter what buffs you have for dodge or if your dodge has maxed out. I still get one shotted every first round when he does his thing and the falling rocks hit me 9999 dmg.
Please redesign this with new update. I've been stuck here for 3 days and currently on try 1453 to defeat the boss.
Pros- at least the Main character bones the heroine.

63885734.review:
This game is very pretty. Meanwhile , is optimized very well even on low end computers. If your a fan of rpgs this game may be a hit or miss. Within the first, 30 minutes the combat has a nice flow to it. Nothing complicated . But, fluid and fast paced where battles don't take up to much time. Where most rpgs tend to over stretch battles. Based on the voice acting the game seems to take a anime style mixed with slice of life. Even, tho I don't speak Chinese I can say the characters are easy to understand just from body language.   Thanks to the devs making hints at where to go I found Faith of Danschant pretty easy to go to where I needed to. 

  But, at the same time it was fun to see what the npc characters were doing. From daily life to dancing , and other things. I felt like this game could be a good entry point to learn some Chinese history in some reguards. The music is nice and scerene so I would easily recommend supporting the game devs if they releasea mp3 ost purchase in the future. 

 So all an all I have to say for a new Chinese dev team the game hits all my check marks for a good game.  Tho my only issue is the lack of english subtitles . But, that could be a lack of translators on the devs end. But, even without the transltions. I'm pretty sure anyone could get some enjoyment out of this game :) 

 Even, if you don't support the Chinese goverment . You should at least give this game a chance.

57625414.review:
可以尝试的一款游戏， 这个游戏的问题是，他格局不像游戏。 

1. 剧情不平均， 这个是一个九州背景的游戏，吸引的地方在于神话化的世界。 在于剧情很的点是没有好好的带玩家经历， 而是带玩家听故事。
2. 桥段的剪接出了问题， 很多简单的桥段太长， 经典的太多太短。 可能是经验问题， 中间没有好好的在编排图版， 很多主角的剧情比较乱和感情没有到位。（有时候不需要大CG）
3. 武器和系统， 完全是一个谜， 没有好好解释为什么大神们 会给你这个系统， 也没有好好解释。 武器因为可以加级所以非常乱， 有时候加级的武器完全没有装备因为不是攻击最高的。。 编排和数位编排上没有仔细考虑。
4. 浪费资源， 尤其是怪兽和地图， 一次性的太多， 游戏变得太过大而无当。 

总体来说， 游戏本身欠了很多游戏根本的条件， 浪费了很多很好的人才和时间。 这是一个游戏， 游戏在于系统和游戏的本质， 过分考量其他东西是这个游戏的败笔。 游戏直得一玩， 可是婆婆妈妈的剧情加上游戏本身的问题扣了不小分数。 可惜了， 真的可惜了。 好题材， 好的人物，背景。

57466090.review:
买了不亏系列，配音比古剑3好，故事更亲民。就是男主性格不讨喜，女主喜欢叫他呆子，我却更倾向于叫他智障圣母婊，附带降智光环。线性流程，打怪数量偏少，野怪不会刷新这点我不理解。前期很简单，难度呈阶梯状增长，进入不周山后逐渐丧心病狂。可以用修改器换成控制女主跑图，女主跳跃可以瞬移，土伯那里能降低难度，和古剑3一样不用修改器是没办法控制女主的。作为一款线性游戏，该有的都有，没有一味追求自由度，各种细节处理很到位，个人认为比起古剑3虽然在动作上缺席但是亮点也掩盖不住

推荐给和我一样喜欢听故事顺便砍砍怪的轻RPG玩家

Like going on a hike, good exercise, but not too strenuous ;)

47863153.review: 挺好的。说不上特别好，主要就是剧情和人设上为了煽情有太多的过度表演，时不时的让人觉得有点羞耻，老套。剧情总体很紧凑，有意思，画面有点浪费虚幻4的能力，但是虚幻4底子高，仍然好于大部分游戏。操作上挺直观的，就是手柄玩的时候a和b的功能设置太恶心人了，反人类，就不能好好的a确认，b返回吗？感情戏可以说是最大的弱点了，男女感情，兄弟姐妹感情，朋友感情都好像几岁小孩子过家家一样。总的来说还是值得一玩，国产游戏的良心之一了。

44437749.review: 10/10 This game is fun and awesome. The problem is the loading screen is damn long but still I very enjoy playing this game.

44360883.review:
Great graphic - beautiful environment, cool and pretty character looks, stunning special effects(Excluding some weird and buggy facial when speaking- weird color teeth and jawmovement)

Great music
Great theme. 

Story ~ somepart good, some conversation seems cheezy/unnatural. 
Bug in story~ a town chief that blocked an attack for protagonist, and act as if i knew him(missed out one side quest?)

Combat is a quite monorail, lacking versatility(either physical or magic, no different in elements, etc). 

Useless normal attack(skill cooldown too fast, no usage of mana/rage resource to limit)

Speed guaranteed a faster queue in turn, but no extra turns. 

Limited combat, thus forcing player to fight in specific ways to earn high rating(better reward) else fall back and the gameplay will be harder. (no grinding, 

Shop can only buy, no selling. 

No much replay value. just a playthrough unless going for hardmode which require u to save/reload for all encounter for high rating, putting stats in DEF to survive.  

Overall view , 5 max
Graphic - 4/5
Story - 3/5
Combat - 2/5
Music - 4/5

hope developers can improve add more features~

43556481.review: it's ok, nice Graphic, but poor story, boring fighting,  but it's ok

43458699.review:
PLEASE BUY Gujian3.

First, this game is undoubtedly one of the remarkable work with related topic. This turn-based jprg game has impressed me with the delicate graph. With the background set in an imagenary dynasty and the hero is unusual from his birth. He maintained his kindness, gained love and friendship in his long journey.

This story is quite old style and all the characters are built plain. You could find them in any of the Chinese drama, cute girls, simple and honest man and so on. The battling system is super time-consuming when you trigger the ultimate skills and I failed to finish the game while getting too boring and knowing the end with half of the story done. The map is quite small and you are restricted to explore with the story goes. With the rising of open-world games, I found it quite boring when I get stuck in a small corner without finding the critical clue to move on.

Even if our game is quite lagged behind in terms of technology, I still believe we win not for the graphics but definitely some else.

So overall I think it's the second best made-in-china game I have played in 2017-2018 and I will keep purchasing their new games to support.

42807233.review:
抱着支持国产的心情买了，总体还是推荐的 6.5/10, 故事情节有点弱，不过故事情节喜好看个人了，本人完全没有感动的感觉，结尾还给了彩蛋，看样子还会有续集，希望能够做出改进，越来越好。
优点：1.画面很精美， 场景大气，还做出了四季不同的感觉，我觉得最后一个地图的雷雨天气做的画面音效都做得很棒
2.人物动作自然，舞蹈动作十分流畅，配乐优美，名副其实是神舞幻想
3.BOSS关难度适中，还设置了一些奖励要求增添了回合制游戏的趣味性。
4.技能，物品升级等系统丰富了传统装备系统
缺点：1. loading 场景时间太长。阴影锯齿严重，感觉图像优化还有很长路要走， 明显感觉大场景loading时间太久。 
2. 战斗开始结束冗余时间太长
3.战斗没有速度条，加速减速都很迷茫，不知道何时触发下一回合，游戏又有相关回合限制，让人感觉不够清晰
4.没有迷宫 ，关卡范围很小，怪数量也是有限，不知道如何让主角刷怪或者打钱
5.穿插了很多小游戏增加游戏难度，但是这些小游戏制作不够精良，游戏说明含糊不清，有时候要重复好多遍自己去摸索规则。另外就算小游戏的初衷很好，概念也符合剧情地图要求，可是游戏的操作感太差根本没办法顺利完成小游戏。很多时候都想弃坑艰难得坚持到ending，如果没有小游戏，这游戏我多给一分。
6.游戏操作感极差，这种体验也是因为有操作要求的小游戏才体现出来，如果是以前的跑迷宫RPG估计也感觉不出来，因为不需要急速转向或者跑跳。有时候地图里面一个跳跃的小沟都能卡十次。
7.场景里有死角，我发现的有三处，进去出不来，只能读盘，感觉测试不到位。

42758463.review:
A rpg with story based on Chinese myths and legend.
Really enjoy the time of playing this game.

42558551.review:
希望官方能看到！图个下载速度在steam买了游戏
-希望能把每个剧情部分做成解锁的方式，方便游戏后再次观看，不需要为了看剧情而再打一遍，这个对我来说非非非非常重要！
我为了记录每个剧情，存了几十个档。。。
-另外，剧情后面就如同大多数玩家评论的，打了鸡血一样！有些事情讲述的不好，人物对话有时候有点尬，以及人物形象刻画有些问题。特别是男主的性格实在让人无话可说！
-人物建模是硬伤。。动作并不完美不过还是可以的，有些人说特别僵硬的个人认为是云玩家。
-虽然不是及时战斗，不过这个回合制还是要打个赞，做的不错~
-不过加点这方面希望能够做的明确一些，比如那个辅助加速度的点，作用不清晰，只知道有可能无法先手，然后也不知道怎么加，加多少才能让自己先手，所以基于这种情况下相信大多数玩家都是走的防御其次攻击。
-游戏指引需要加强，即使地图自由度不高指引也是会经常找东西找半天。
-希望能略加一点自由度，增添趣味性，比如说可以跳进池塘里，没准还能发现个宝箱什么的。

最后支持一下，希望出2
非常非常非常希望

41623425.review:
Good game on Chinese RPG game, 
1.Graphics is Great.
2.Skill Effect is Great.
3.Character detail and Emotion is Great.

But have some have to improve.
1.The World is not open and if u miss something, you cant go back. you can load previous game data.
2.The Direction to pick item or into next map. not very good to take it, something u need find the real point to take it.

But still good to play, is a very big jump to near FF15.

41579974.review:
Played about 4 hours trying to get through it without any English translation. Seems like a very good turned based rpg with heavy story elements. The only problem is that there is no English subtitles. I struggled through not knowing what to do or what was going on. Don't understand why this is on the US store without subtitles at least. 
Will recommend if subtitles ever come out.

41475247.review: Love this story. Typical wuxia fan here. Suit me the best. Sadly I can't read the words. Need Google Image Translate to help me for side-quests

41410565.review: this is a great RPG game.  I love the story and the animation and gameplay mechanic system.  a job well deon.  looking forward for more better game from this company.

41314538.review:
My god this game is so... good.... theres no question about the art style and the visual of the game i can recommend it.

but it kinda shame that the dev said "No English Version" i hope it was mean for now and I hope they will make it or at least the UI and Subtitle , because i cant understand the game mecanic if i dont understand the language


i will not refund this game... it's a good game and i buy it and support it 


i hope someone or the dev team make the english text for this game

41205730.review:
+ 画面上的进步是我愿意买一份支持的最大动力。
- 战斗系统上学FF的ATB，从仙剑开始学，到神舞依旧没改出一个舒服的样子。
- 不管是剧情还是配乐，品味实在有些糟糕，一段古风舞配个像是现代芭蕾舞的音乐

7/10吧。分数全给画面，希望下一作在其他部分还能有进步呢

41146890.review:
Even though only 1.2 hours time of playing, the graphics make me feel worth the price of the game. Graphics always an eyesore in chinese RPG, a lot of graphic bugs or not well optimize. But this one really surprise me. Still there is a lot of room to be improved. But a game with such a price, I can't demand more than this. Compared to other big RPG titles, this game is really value to buy.

Pro:
-Brilliant graphics

-Not much graphics glitches as other chinese RPG do.


Con:

-Just a so so Storyline.

-Lame character interaction design
(Sometimes u will see the mouth of character is not catching up with what the voice casting)
(Stupid lines design such as "Thanks for god giving" everytime u pickup item on map)

- No map????
(they just give u a compass)

-Outdated battle design
(Inner still old school turn based like Chinese paladin. Bro it's been more than 20 years chinese RPG using this, why don't try something different?)

41143827.review:
No map sytem is really worse for a rpg game hehe
Stabilisation of game and tuning for the game is not good enough if compared to usual 3A game hehe
The loading of scene just too slow hehe
Overall, in my opinion, the quality of this game has not up to 3A game standard hehe
However, this is a big step for China game and hope can see a really good game produced by China in future.

41008262.review: Great game developed by Unreal 4 Engine. Finally it's on Steam after 4 months of actual release in Taiwan / Hong Kong. It's really amazing and kind of surprise to me that Chinese developer can make a brilliant RPG. Storyline and character setting is indeed attractive. Highly recommend you to get this game!
